enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: In closing, the UNFCCC Executive Secretary repeated comments made in SBSTA regarding the financial implications of conclusions adopted at SB-20.

On behalf of SBI Rapporteur Gonzalo Menéndez, Chair Stoycheva invited Parties to consider the report on the session (FCCC/SBI/2004/L.1), which Parties adopted without amendment. The US expressed gratitude to the Executive Secretary for her comments on the financial implications of the adopted conclusions.
Qatar, for the G-77/China, looked forward to COP-10.
The EU said negotiations had provided a clearer picture and expressed hope for discussions at SBI-21.
Chair Stoycheva closed SBI-20 at 4:25 pm.
